## LogLevel enum

Log levels.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum LogLevel 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Complain | <code>2</code> | Anything that is notable but doesn't result in an error will be logged with this. This includes any detected bad practises or habits. |
|  Normal | <code>1</code> | General events of note such as progress milestones. |
|  Scream | <code>3</code> | Shit is about to hit the fan. Expect an unrecoverable error very soon. |
|  Silly | <code>0</code> | A lot will be tagged as silly. These messages should only be used for debugging. Creativity may be required to distill anything useful. |
